When I started my course I got a username and password that allows me to log on to the services provided by the college on and off campus. I can log on to the library link to library of specific institution) and view my library account. I can also access the Virtual Learning Environment (VLE) and can look up what reading material is required for the course. I can send messages to fellow students and to tutors while logged on and I am kept up to date with what’s happening. The college also provided me with an email address that is linked directly to my student number. If I run into any difficulty with my username & password or email address I contact the computer centre and they sort it out for me. I will give you a tip…. Always remember to log off from your student account and your email whenever you stop working on a computer, you must keep your passwords safe and do not give them to anyone!
